name: addSecurityLevelMembers
description:
Adds members to the issue security level. You can add up to 100 members per request.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

schemeId.description: The ID of the issue security scheme.

levelId.description: The ID of the issue security level.

SecuritySchemeMembersRequest.description: Details of issue security scheme level new members.

members.description: The list of level members which should be added to the issue security scheme level.

parameter.description: The value corresponding to the specified member type.

type.description: The issue security level member type, e.g `reporter`, `group`, `user`.

$ul: **errorMessages**: The list of error messages produced by this operation. For example, "input parameter 'key' must be provided"

**errors**: The list of errors by parameter returned by the operation. For example,"projectKey": "Project keys must start with an uppercase letter, followed by one or more uppercase alphanumeric characters."
